sub_title: People & Culture | Global Mobility | HR Business Partner | Connector
summary:
I am a driven PEOPLE & CULTURE ENTHUSIAST and GLOBAL MOBILITY EXPERT with a proven track record of more than 15 years of experience in the following areas: 
employee relations, performance management, process optimisation, vitality and prevention, supporting line managers, project management, immigration, 30% (expatriate) tax ruling, on- and off-boarding of employees.
Connecting (with) people and making impact is what drives me. I always look for ways to improve and do things better. Setting up people for success is what drives me, seeing them grow in confidence and their performance is what makes my day.

profile_positions.description:
Leading a Global Mobility team + Account Lead for small, medium and large accounts
Overseeing the entire process of relocation of international talent, including relationship, project and vendor management, reporting, initiating process improvements, client onboarding and handling escalations, negotiating + setting up client contracts and SLAs.
As team lead responsible for leading, coaching and supporting a team of four.
profile_positions.title: Global Mobility Lead

profile_positions.description:
In 1986 Optiver started business as a single trader on the floor of Amsterdam’s European Options Exchange. Today, Optiver is an international leading global electronic market maker, focused on pricing, execution and risk management, headquartered in Amsterdam. With more than 1000 colleagues across four continents they constantly offer fair and highly competitive prices for the buying and selling of stocks, bonds, options, futures, ETF’s et cetera. It is called ‘market making’.

No two days are the same. Optiver brings together a multidisciplinary group of talented people from all over the world who together strive to be better tomorrow, than they are today.

Within my role I am responsible for a wide range of HR matters:
On-boarding of international talent, immigration, relocation. 
Global mobility, coordinating international assignments and transfers, compensation & benefits, 30% tax ruling (expatriate tax ruling in the Netherlands)
Optimization of processes and HRIS landscape
Health and absence management
Payroll coordination in NL, UK, US and PL
Giving talent the best employee experience
profile_positions.title: HR Officer

profile_positions.description:
Created in 1828, Bureau Veritas is a global leader in Testing, Inspection and Certification (TIC), delivering high quality services to help clients meet the growing challenges of quality, safety, environmental protection and social responsibility.
 
As a trusted partner, Bureau Veritas offers innovative solutions that go beyond simple compliance with regulations and standards, reducing risk, improving performance and promoting sustainable development.

As a generalist I was responsible for all HR matters, such as:
In-, through- and outflow
Training, development & performance management
Health & safety (Arbo)
Providing full HR support to all business lines in primarily the Netherlands on recruitment, employee relations and employment law, performance management, reward, training and development 
Responsible for 100% accurate HR data
Reporting
Participating in HR related projects, such as:
BeVital - Vitality Programme
Onboarding and indurction Programme for new hires
profile_positions.title: HR Partner

profile_positions.description:
IBFD is a leading International Tax Knowledge Centre. Its core business is research, publications and education in the area of cross-border and international taxation. IBFD has a strong international client base of specifically Fortune 500 companies, governments, international consultancy firms and tax advisers. IBFD carries out government consultancy projects and its International Tax Academy provides a wide range of courses on international taxation. Founded in 1938 and headquartered in Amsterdam, IBFD also has a local presence in important markets such as North America, Asia and China. 

As HR Coordinator within the Knowledge Centre, I was responsible for:
Attracting and onboarding international talent, immigration and 30% ruling
Talent and management developement, reward & performance management. Health and absence management.
Supporting and coaching of line managers on attracting and retaining international talent.
profile_positions.title: HR Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
On- and off-boarding of international talent; including immigration, relocation of talent and 30% ruling for highly skilled migrants
Maintaining and optimizing the HRIS landscape
Maintaining Intranet and the Employee Guides for all offices: the Netherlands, Malaysia, China and the United States of America
Learning & Development; coordinating inhouse and external trainings
Drafting job profiles, performance management and reward 
Setting up and coordinating of the onboarding programme
Health and absence management
Coordinating the implementation of a new HRIS
profile_positions.title: HR Staff Member

profile_positions.description:
The Nyenrode Business Universiteit was founded by and for the business community. The Nyenrode Business School and the Nyenrode School of Accountancy & Controlling are two of the more prominent schools of their kind in Europe. Nyenrode aims to educate astute, driven and involved students and help them achieve success on the job market—students who are characterized by the Nyenrode Spirit of Enterprise. The institute is located on a thirteenth-century country estate in Breukelen, the Netherlands.

Recruitment, on- and off-boarding of employees
Coordinating the CLA negotiations
Health and safety (Arbo) and reporting
Maintaining HR Intranet and the publication of vacancies at the corporate website
Coaching line managers and employees with regards to recruitment, transfers and departures
HRIS application management and coordinating the implementation of a new HRIS.
profile_positions.title: HR Employee
Consultant

profile_positions.description:
LeasePlan distinguishes itself through its strong views on mobility. The country’s largest lease organisation considers the (company) car the most important element of mobility – and through this one of the essential cornerstones of our economy. 
At the same time LeasePlan advocates that driving should become smarter, cleaner and more efficient. Smarter by spreading the traffic flow better throughout the day. Cleaner through focusing on low-energy and intelligent car technology.

Managing the absence through sickness administration 
Assisting in recruitment
Delivering management information reports
Drafting and publishing vacancies on the corporate website
Maintaining the HR Intranet page
Maintaining the HR system and the personnel files
Liaising with recruitment agencies and processing the administrative work
Coordinating internal courses
profile_positions.title: Intern HRM
